name: 223-27 heart on fire
sizes_available: xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl
notes:
knitted top in drops safran. piece is knitted with lace pattern and v-neck. size: xs - xxl.

drops design: pattern e-316; yarn group a

**size**:
xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl

**materials**:
drops safran from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
150-150-150-150-200-200 g colour 59, red clay

**knitting tension**:
24 stitches in width and 32 rows vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.

needles:
drops circular needle size 3 mm: length 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch and lace pattern.
double pointed needles size 2.5 mm: for straps.
drops circular needle size 2.5 mm: length 60 or 80 cm for rib.
